text: Talking in Your Sleep may refer to: *Somniloquy, the act of talking while asleep *"Talking in Your Sleep" (Crystal Gayle song), 1978 *"Talking in Your Sleep" (The Romantics song), 1983 *Talking in Your Sleep (The Cinema album), 2014 *Talking in Your Sleep (Lena Philipsson album), 1988 *"Talking in Your Sleep", a song by Gordon Lightfoot from the album Summer Side of Life
title: Talking in Your Sleep
